%%
\pgfsetcolor{black}
  % Edge: word -> sequence
  \draw [->] (54.002bp,66bp) .. controls (74.739bp,66bp) and (104.96bp,66bp)  .. (143.69bp,66bp);
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (94bp,75.5bp) node {lexicale};
  % Edge: wordX -> sequenceX
  \draw [->] (54.002bp,20bp) .. controls (72.429bp,20bp) and (98.348bp,20bp)  .. (134.2bp,20bp);
  % Edge: sequence -> result
  \draw [->] (288.24bp,66bp) .. controls (321.69bp,66bp) and (360.14bp,66bp)  .. (397.86bp,66bp);
  \draw (346bp,76.5bp) node {syntaxique};
  % Edge: sequenceX -> resultX
  \draw [->] (297.62bp,20bp) .. controls (327.42bp,20bp) and (359.89bp,20bp)  .. (394.46bp,20bp);
  % Node: word
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw [state] (27bp,66bp) ellipse (27bp and 18bp);
  \draw (27bp,66bp) node {mot};
\end{scope}
  % Node: resultX
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (425bp,20bp) node {\begin{tikzpicture}[node distance=2cm] \node [state, scale=.3] (foo1) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below left of=foo1] (foo2) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below right of=foo1] (foo3) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below left of=foo3] (foo4) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below right of=foo3] (foo5) {}; \draw [thick] (foo1) -- (foo2) (foo1) -- (foo3) (foo3) -- (foo4) (foo3) -- (foo5); \end{tikzpicture}};
\end{scope}
  % Node: sequence
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw [state] (216bp,66bp) ellipse (72bp and 18bp);
  \draw (216bp,66bp) node {séquence de lexèmes};
\end{scope}
  % Node: result
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw [state,accepting] (425bp,66bp) ellipse (27bp and 18bp);
  \draw (425bp,66bp) node {AST};
\end{scope}
  % Node: sequenceX
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (216bp,20bp) node {$[[\code{7} \mapsto \dots], [\code{+} \mapsto \dots], [\code{42} \mapsto \dots]]$};
\end{scope}
  % Node: wordX
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (27bp,20bp) node {\code{7 + 42}};
\end{scope}
%
